name: The Alien Trials
description:
The Alien Trials is an action packed 1v1 fighting game. The rules are simple. Win the duel by successfully knocking out your foe. Play as an extraterrestrial in the ultimate brawl for survival!Features
  • Online Multiplayer - Host/Join matches online to showcase your true skill level or invite & play with friends.
  • Training - Not ready for online play? Train your combat skills here with multiple AI modes.
  • Unique Attacks & Movement Skills - Different options to take on your enemy. Discover combos that work well with your playstyle.
  • Immersive Combat - Multiple visual and audio cues to fuel every punch or kick as you inch closer to victory.
